bibl.title: The Alcestis Papyrus Revisited: Addendum.
bibl.note: "Corrections, improvements or comments on my article in: ZPE 65 (1986) pp. 36-57. An exhaustive commentary is to be found in my forthcoming book: Alcestis Barcinonensis, in addition to an article to appear in: ANRW II, 34, 3". - 1. Notes on the Text. - 2. On the Date of the Poem (around the middle of the fourth cent.).
bibl.seg: Marcovich Miroslav, The Alcestis Papyrus Revisited: Addendum.
